mapper.insert: insert into QUESboard(QUESbno, title, content, writer) values (seq_QUESboard.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.update: update QUESboard set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updateDate = sysdate where QUESbno = #{QUESbno}
update QUESboard set commentCnt = commentCnt + #{amount} where QUESbno = #{QUESbno}
update QUESboard set boardLikeCnt = answerCnt + #{amount} where QUESbno = #{QUESbno}
